01.About Me

Hello! I'm Yinka, a frontend developer who cares deeply about details. Specializing in the JavaScript ecosystem (React.js, Next.js). I priortize accesibility and fluid UI mechanics to create products that do not just work well, but feel great to use.

Fast-forward to today, I've had the privilege of working for a startup, a designer, and a government organization. My main focus these days is building accessible, performant products and digital experiences at appropriate time for a variety of clients.

When i'm not coding, I am either gaminng, researching on latest design trends or sharing what i learn with others

Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

  • ▹TypeScript
  • ▹React
  • ▹Next.js
  • ▹Chakra UI
  • ▹Tailwind CSS
  • ▹Framer Motion
  • ▹Shadcn UI
  • ▹TanStack Query

03.Some Things I've Built

Featured Project

Spotify Profile

A web app for visualizing personalized Spotify data. View your top artists, top tracks, recently played tracks, and detailed audio information about each track. Create and save new playlists of recommended tracks based on your existing playlists and more.

  • React
  • Styled Components
  • Express
  • Spotify API

Featured Project

AI Code Assistant

An intelligent coding assistant that helps developers write better code faster. Features include code completion, bug detection, refactoring suggestions, and natural language to code conversion. Built with modern LLM technology.

  • Next.js
  • TypeScript
  • OpenAI
  • Tailwind CSS

Featured Project

Collaborative Canvas

A real-time collaborative drawing application where multiple users can create and edit designs together. Features include layers, shapes, text, and image uploads with instant synchronization across all connected clients.

  • React
  • WebSocket
  • Canvas API
  • Node.js

Other Noteworthy Projects

Weather Dashboard

A clean weather application with beautiful visualizations and 7-day forecasts.

  • React
  • Chart.js
  • Weather API

Task Manager CLI

A command-line task management tool with cloud sync and team collaboration features.

  • Node.js
  • MongoDB
  • Commander.js

Portfolio Generator

Generate beautiful portfolio websites from a simple JSON configuration file.

  • Next.js
  • MDX
  • Tailwind

E-commerce Starter

A full-featured e-commerce starter template with Stripe integration.

  • Next.js
  • Stripe
  • Prisma

Chrome Extension Kit

A starter kit for building Chrome extensions with React and TypeScript.

  • React
  • TypeScript
  • Chrome API

Markdown Editor

A minimal markdown editor with live preview and export functionality.

  • React
  • Marked
  • CodeMirror
